article: apparently in an attempt to insure that it retains power , the socialist party , the direct heir of bulgaria 's hardline communists , announced on monday night that it was ready to enter into a `` wide dialogue '' with the opposition party that has been holding mass demonstrations daily .
abstract: bulgarian socialists ready for dialogue with opposition
